articles.author: Jaclyn Gallucci
articles.title: Trump puts Pence in charge of coronavirus efforts, calls risk to Americans ‘very low’
articles.description: 'The risk to the American people remains very low,' Trump said during a press conference about the coronavirus.

articles.author: Chris Morris
articles.title: Trump administration budget cuts could become a major problem as coronavirus spreads
articles.description: Several global health units of the U.S. government have faced budget crises—or shut down completely.

articles.author: kdunn6
articles.title: Oil demand was set to rise in 2020, then the coronavirus outbreak hit
articles.description: This week, the oil industry was trying to map out the demand impact of the virus—and avoiding parties and finger food.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: The 1-meter rule: virologists pan high fives, ‘bro hugs’ and kissing as the coronavirus spreads
articles.description: It's not the first time: King Henry VI of England banned kissing in 1439 to battle the plague.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: Cathay Pacific says 25,000 staff are taking unpaid leave as coronavirus outbreak batters travel
articles.description: The Hong Kong-based airline this month asked its 33,000 workers to take three weeks off between March 1 and June 30.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: London joins coronavirus work-from-home trend as Chevron sends traders home over sick employee
articles.description: The employee had flu-like symptoms and coronavirus hasn’t been confirmed.

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: ‘This could be bad’—the latest coronavirus warnings send markets reeling
articles.description: The S&P 500 has suffered its worst two-day stretch since 2015. And the futures are pointing down again this morning.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: A new coronavirus test in Singapore is providing clues about how the outbreak spreads
articles.description: The test is establishing links between cases in the city-state.

articles.author: Grady McGregor
articles.title: China deploys a favorite weapon in the coronavirus crisis: A crackdown on VPNs
articles.description: Virtual private networks that let Internet users bypass government censors are coming under fire.
